casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 3, 2010

[Cite as 02103/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-341.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-2047. State v. Palmer.

Hamilton App. No. C-010583, 178 Ohio App.3d 192, 2008-Ohio-4604. This cause came on for further consideration upon the motion of Ohio Public Defender for leave to withdraw as counsel and motion for appointment of counsel.

It is ordered by the court that the motions are granted and that Lynn Maro of Boardman, Ohio, is appointed to represent appellee.
